question: You have just returned home from a holiday and have received photographs from a friend who was on holiday with you.Write to your frind thanking them for the photographs. You should include:-a description of the photos-the most memorable thing about the holiday-invite them to come and stay with you
text: Hope you and your family doing amazing. I am writing this letter in the context of the photograph that I had just received for our holiday in Manali. The picture look amazing and rejuvenated my memories of the trip. Moreover, my parents also loved it as it reflects the friendship bond between the two of us.

Trekking to the top of the cliff has made my trip unforgettable and I really liked the bonfire dinner there and it was one of the most memorable acts because the view from there was mesmerising as one can see the whole city. Besides, the stay at the local homestay was so relaxing and beyond any expression of words.

Furthermore, I would like to invite you to my new farmhouse in the outskirts of Shimla and be my guest. We would enjoy and rover around the city and its surroundings. I once again thank you for the beautiful picture and hope to listen from you soon.
